description: Creates a Windows Defender Firewall rule to block a specific IPv4 address (Inbound or Outbound). Validates IPv4 format, is idempotent (reports if rule already exists), and emits a single NDJSON line with the outcome. Writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback. Requires administrative privileges.

script_parameters.name: Direction
script_parameters.description: Firewall rule direction: Inbound or Outbound.

script_parameters.name: MaxWaitSeconds
script_parameters.description: Optional max wait/timeout budget for operations.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
